abilities.name: Incredible Strength
info: Mr. Incredible is Immune to Knock Back, except from Special Abilities.

For each second Mr. Incredible holds his Heavy Attack, he gains a Kinetic Charge, each increasing damage Resistance by 1%. He loses all Kinetic Charges if inflicted with Stun, Root, or Freeze. (Max Stacks: 5)
Mr. Incredible’s Heavy Attack has a 50% chance to inflict Kinetic Knockback. This chance is increased by 5% for each Kinetic Charge. This Kinetic Knockback effect can only activate every 10 seconds.

abilities.name: Unstoppable Justice
info: Mr. Incredible gains 10% Armor, 5 Kinetic Charges, and deals 400% damage to his combat target, inflicting Kinetic Knockback. (Max Stacks: 5)
Mr. Incredible gains an Unstoppable Justice Charge for 10 seconds, allowing his Basic Attacks to Purge Attack Buffs and allowing him to activate his Heavy Attack Kinetic Knockback continuously.
When the Unstoppable Justice Charge expires, Mr. Incredible loses all Kinetic Charges and gains a Defense Buff worth 2% for each charge lost this way. (Max Stacks: 10)

abilities.name: Kinetic Explosion
info: Whenever Mr. Incredible uses his Special Ability, after Unstoppable Justice expires, he deals 200% damage and inflicts Kinetic Knockback to all enemies in an area around him.
When an enemy inflicted with Kinetic Knockback collides with another enemy, the other enemy is inflicted with Kinetic Knockback and both take 200% damage.

talents.name: Super Strong
talents.info: Grants +20% Attack at the start of an encounter.

talents.name: Super Tough
talents.info: Grants +20% Defense at the start of an encounter.

talents.name: Charged Punches
talents.info: When Mr. Incredible uses 4 consecutive Basic Attacks, he has a 100% chance to gain a Kinetic Charge. Each Kinetic Charge also increases Basic Attack damage by 10%.

talents.name: Determined
talents.info: At the start of each combat, Mr. Incredible gains a 20% Defense Buff that lasts until the end of the encounter. [Max Stacks: 5]

talents.name: Advanced Super Suit
talents.info: Whenever Mr. Incredible gains a Kinetic Charge, he also gains a 5% Defense Buff that lasts until the end of combat. [Max Stacks: 10] Mr. Incredible’s Heavy Attack deals an additional 100% damage.

talents.name: Show Time!
talents.info: When Mr. Incredible uses his Special Ability, he gains an additional 10% Armor. Whenever Mr. Incredible gains a Kinetic Charge, he also gains a 10% Attack Buff for 5 seconds. [Max Stacks: 10]
